entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with drizzle beginning in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
